alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 2:57PM CDT until April 15 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SEBASTIAN AND NORTHEASTERN LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cameron, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Poteau... Pocola... Spiro... Panama... Hackett... Bonanza... Cameron... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Shady Point... Rock Island... Scullyville... Braden... Rye Hill... Jenson... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 10 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
